stripe_payments.label: Stripe Payments
stripe_payments.comment: Please note: If you do not yet have a Stripe account, please click here to register.

title.label: Title
title.comment: This appears at the checkout page during payment

stripe_mode.label: Mode
stripe_mode.comment: Set this to live when you are ready to accept payments

stripe_test_sk.label: Test Secret Key
stripe_test_sk.comment: stripe.com/account > API Keys > Test Secret Key

stripe_test_pk.label: Test Publishable Key
stripe_test_pk.comment: stripe.com/account > API Keys > Test Publishable Key

stripe_live_sk.label: Live Secret Key
stripe_live_sk.comment: stripe.com/account > API Keys > Live Secret Key

stripe_live_pk.label: Live Publishable Key
stripe_live_pk.comment: stripe.com/account > API Keys > Live Publishable Key

apple_pay_checkout.label: Apple Pay
apple_pay_checkout.comment: Enable Apple Pay, Google Pay and Microsoft Pay on the checkout page.

apple_pay_location.label: Apple Pay Button Location
apple_pay_location.comment: Where should we display the Apple Pay button?

expired_authorizations.label: Expired Authorizations
expired_authorizations.comment: Authorizations will typically expire after 7 days. What should we do if an admin tries to capture an expired authorization?

automatic_invoicing.label: Automatic Invoicing
automatic_invoicing.comment: For Authorize Only orders, should we automatically create an invoice in Pending status right after the order?

radar_risk_level.label: Stripe Radar
radar_risk_level.comment: When enabled, elevated risk orders will be placed under review.

moto_exemptions.label: SCA MOTO Exemptions
moto_exemptions.comment: Only enable this if your Stripe account has been gated to use MOTO exemptions.

ccsave.label: Save Customer Cards
ccsave.comment: Enable this if you want to save customer cards on Stripe's servers so that they don't have to enter the details of the same card twice

email_invoice.label: Email Copy of Invoice
email_invoice.comment: At the checkout, should we also send an invoice by email?

use_store_currency.label: Pay in store currency
use_store_currency.comment: Choose "Yes" to use store view currency instead of base currency.

sort_order.label: Sort Order
sort_order.comment: Adjust this to move the payment method above or below other payment methods

stripe_payments_express.label: Stripe Express Checkout
stripe_payments_express.comment: Allow your customers to checkout with Apple Pay, Google Pay and Microsoft Pay directly from the product page or the shopping cart page.

stripe_payments_bancontact.label: Stripe Bancontact
stripe_payments_bancontact.comment: Stripe Bancontact is a payment method made available through the Stripe payment gateway.

title.label: Title
title.comment: This appears at the checkout page during payment

sort_order.comment: Adjust this to move the payment method above or below other payment methods
